Good food - fresh and interesting local market pizzas.  Great beer selection.

The pizza here, in my opinion, is pretty average compared to other pizzas around the Valley, though they do get bonus points for smoky crusts and fresh ingredients.    What bumps this place from three to four stars for me is the spinach salad with the house dressing.  It is, by far, one of the best salads I've ever had in these great States.  Strips of applewood smoked bacon.  Need I say more?

I am reminded of what a really good pizza is supposed to taste like whenever we pop in here.   Tonight we had a market salad with kale/berries/nuts which was really delicious.  This evening's special pizza was a real treat....homemade sausage with balsamic reduction drizzle, then topped with pepperoni and other fantastically fresh ingredients.  Very accommodating staff who provide excellent service and even turned the heaters on for us - the only diners on the patio (for awhile). Love this family restaurant who serves fresh, tasty food.
Numero Uno Pizza with a whole wheat crust  is my fave Nellos Pizza... had it for my Bday tonight!!

Ordered the grinder panini being a fan of Italian deli meats.  First off, it wasn't even a panini. It was a cold sub. It was okay, very heavy on the vinegar for my taste but not a bad sandwich. I've been told just to stick with the pizza here and avoid the rest of the menu. I do want to note that the server had asked me what I wanted for my side, so I picked the salad, assuming it was included. Come to find out when I got the bill it was an add-on I was being charged extra for. So after tax, tip and drink it was almost a $20 lunch for an okay sandwich. I'll try some other places around here.
Great wood fired pizza. Good service cold beer. Had the spinach salad with house dressing.  Great split three ways.

This has been one of our favorite restaurants for 25 years. Everything on the menu is delicious and the prices are reasonable.  Almost everything is made on-site. All Nellos locations are good (including the Parlor in Phoenix) but this is our favorite location.
Best pizza ever. Great employees. The salads are awesome. Say hi to the staff. Michael Hitzel is the best.
The pizza was tasty and fresh, the service was great. We brought a child here that we were babysitting and he loved his food. He's 7 and enjoyed a kids pizza.

A favorite of mine. I had discovered Nello's back when I lived in Ahwatukee during my college days. I would dine in and take out. It was that good. The atmosphere is great. The service is great. The food is great.   I dropped in there today, for old times sake, and it was still just as good. I had the lunch special which was a house salad with their signature tomato basil based vinagrette, an 8" pizza with homemade sausage and mushrooms, and a Diet Coke. All for $9.95! What a deal!  If you want quality pizza, go to Nello's.

Been going to Nello's for years, but after last night, I'm taking some time off and spending my pizza $ elsewhere.  Not crowded, table for 3 in the bar....2 entrees came out quickly while I waited for a woodfired pizza.  My wife's salad was missing the pancetta as advertised.  My pizza finally arrived but was made incorrectly...I was told no problem, we'll make another one....waited, waited and bingo ANOTHER wrong pizza - this time it wasn't even close. After 2 hours I asked for the check and I'm gone.  Nello's get it together please and do something about your pizza dough - it's like cardboard lately.  Headed to Florencia for a while....and so is my $.

Nello's Pizza in Ahwatukee....sometimes very crowded, but always worth the wait.  I cannot speak for the rest of the menu, but I can say that any kind of pizza you order here is going to be excellent.  We have been enjoying Nello's for years and have never had a bad or questionable pie.  Nello's offers a pretty good selection of beers...and there are usually a couple of rotating taps that pour local craft favorites.  The atmosphere is typically bustling, oftentimes loud inside during rush hours...which is probably why we enjoy coming here when we are dining with our kids.  I'd definitely recommend Nello's and often bring out of town visitors in for a pie.  It's close by too, which is an added convenience.
Fantastic services by Mary Anne. Made my family feel  like we've becoming there for years. "This was our first time".food was amazing high quality products and ingredients.

I really like Nellos Pizza. Their pizza is very good, but it doesn't stop there. I love their Pork Wings that are smoothered in a house mustard based buffalo sause. They have excellent tossed salads and tasty appatizers. Nice ambiance with a clean, nice, simple, Italian decor. Great place to grab dinner and a drink with family and friends.

Even though Nellos's Pizza is close to my home and a Phoenix favorite, I never go there. I'm a Pizza Hut fan, but they closed the location near me, so I called Nello's for a carryout. Ordered an 8" pizza with pepperoni and pineapple (don't judge me) for $7. Got there and they opened the box to show me the pizza, cut into quarters. There were (count 'em) eight tiny pieces of pineapple (that's two per slice) and the big fat puffy crust comprised 1/3 of the entire pizza. No kidding! It was so bizarre-looking that should have taken a pic. But no worries, I thought....I like crust and they gave me a side of pineapple. Well, it was the WORST pizza I've ever eaten. Totally flavorless. Lesson learned. Back to Pizza Hut I go, even if it means driving five miles to the nearest location. I hate wasting money on bad food!

I love this place. Antipasto salad and a glass of red wine is my favorite meal. Everything from the pizza, salads and sandwiches are amazing. I'm the biggest Arnold Palmer drink fan and this place just knows how to serve it. The staff is always friendly and will go above to make sure your visit is great. Out of the 500+ restaurants in Phoenix, Nello's is my favorite. I call it, "The Italian mother I never had restaurant." They are only open until 10pm so make sure you arrive early in the evening. If you want to continue drinking after dinner, Zipps is right next door!

Great atmosphere and the food was enjoyable. Went on a busy Friday night and it seemed like the service and food preparation suffered a little. Staff was friends and helpful, just not as attentive as you'd like to see, even on a really busy evening. I may just be partial to the Tempe location on McClintock where I've loved the food since my high school lunch days, way back to '96. I think I'll head there next time I get that uniquely distinct Nello's pizza craving.
Nello's is the best!  Great local feel, great food, love this place.  You have to have:  (Gluten Free) Pizza, Garden Salad with Turkey and House Dressing.  It will soon be your go to feel good order.

I have to give props to Mo who works at this location of Nellos pizza. I came in today with a school group and she was amazing. She took care of us without hesitation and was great with the kids. Things can get a little messy with our bunch, but   she didn't seem to mind at all. The service was incredible. The food is nothing crazy special... Decent pizza, very tasty house salad dressing. Everything seemed fresh. I would recommend this restaurant and thank you again Mo!
Pizza lovers & pasta lovers this the place for you. The service was good. Portions were large enough to share. My boys had burgers that were to die for.
We go here maybe once a month, the food and service never fails ! ALWAYS AMAZING!!!   One of my favorite places to go !

Nellos pizza is very good and I'll order it from time to time but I come here for the pasta. It's so fresh and so delicious, I could eat two bowls if my stomach could fit it.  This is my favorite date night spot with my boyfriend. The ambiance is warm and the staff are very friendly. One of my favorite places!

My family loves to eat at Nellos. The Happy Hour prices make dining out with kids easier on the budget and we've always had good to great customer service. The food clinches the five star review for me...always delicious and the Market options keep things interesting!

Thin crust, deep dish, meat eaters, vegetarians, salads, pasta, microbrews........ Nellos excels with them all.   Spinach pie on thin is my favorite. Get thin crust  and eat more!!     Consistently good at all locations.
Great pizza, what else is there to say? Personally I've not ordered anything else there except pizza, but that's what I go there for in the first place.  You will not be disappointed.

My husband and I went here tonight but unlike most of the reviewers, we did not order pizza.  We started off with the eggplant bruchetta which was phenomenal.  My husband got the chicken pesto which he says was the best pesto he's ever had.  I ordered the lasagne which was also very good though I will say you really have to really like ricotta cheese in order to enjoy it.  This place has great food and service and I really love the fact that they have so many microbrews on tap and wines by the glass at reasonable prices.

Market pizzas are always unique and amazing! I come here 1-2 times a week- it's our little neighborhood go-to. All of the food is delicious. We have tried everything on the menu and you won't be disappointed with each item! Home made pastas and pizza. Bruschetta is out of this world! Plus they have a great selection of wine and beer. Definitely should try this if you're looking for great food and great prices.
